dct_title_s: Delineatio orarum maritimarum, terrae vulgo indigetatae terra do Natal item Sofalae, Mozambicae & Melindae, insulæque sancti Laurentij
dct_description_sm: Arnoldus F. à Langren delineavit & scalpsit ; Scale approximately 1:13,000,000 ; Relief shown pictorially ; Companion map to Typus orarum maritimarum Guineae, Manicongo, & Angôlae ultra promontorium Bonae Spei ... ; Includes decorative strapwork cartouche, compass roses and navigation hazards ; Title in Latin and Dutch. Place names in Latin and Portuguese. ; Detached from Itinerario, voyage ofte schipvaert van Jan Huygen van Linschoten naer Oost ofte Portugaels Indien ; Amsterdam : A. Langren; Source: Langren, Arnold Florent van, 1580-1644. Itinerario, voyage ofte schipvaert van Jan. Huygen van Linschoten naer Oost ofte Portugaels Indien. Amsterdam : A. Langren, 1596.
dct_rights_sm: The images on this web site, from maps in the collection of the Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies and housed in the Government & Geographic Information Collection of Northwestern University Libraries are in the public domain in the United States, and as such, not subject to copyright restriction. The Libraries request users cite both the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from the repository. For access to higher resolution images please contact repository@northwestern.edu
